quotes.quote: If youre going to limit your dreams, at least tend them to infinity
quotes.author: internet

quotes.quote: If people don't believe Mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for Im learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa Alcott

quotes.quote: There's no sense in being precise when you don't even know what you're talking about.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: Anyone who attempts to generate random numbers by deterministic means is, of course, living in a state of sin.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: You insist that there is something a machine cannot do. If you tell me precisely what it is a machine cannot do, then I can always make a machine which will do just that.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: Computers are like humans - they do everything except think.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: There probably is a God. Many things are easier to explain if there is than if there isn't.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: Science, as well as technology, will in the near and in the farther future increasingly turn from problems of intensity, substance, and energy, to problems of structure, organization, information, and control.
quotes.author: John von Neumann

quotes.quote: The total subject of mathematics is clearly too broad for any of us. I do not think that any mathematician since Gauss has covered it uniformly and fully; even Hilbert did not and all of us are of considerably lesser width quite apart from the question of depth than Hilbert.
quotes.author: John von Neumann
